Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_sample_volume

The function AIL_sample_volume returns the current sample volume, from 0 (minimum) to 127 (maximum).

S32 AIL_sample_volume(
  HSAMPLE S
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle whose volume is to be returned.

Returns

The sample's current volume value.

Discussion

See AIL_set_sample_volume for more information.


Group: 2D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_digital_master_volume, AIL_sample_pan, AIL_sample_reverb, AIL_set_digital_master_volume, AIL_set_sample_reverb, AIL_set_sample_volume
Related Basic Types: HSAMPLE, S32
